HomeWiki:
public and private chat between all user online and capability send mail and message for offline user!
easily deploy and configuration.

XC(xamfia chat) is a software containing user control that simply creats some relationships between a web site user ,such as preserved pair chating and public chating for online user also send mail and message for offline user and in next version sharing file and pictures.
the major package XC developed by C# language(.NET 2.0)and based on web service and Ajax.
each user control gathers and callects its neccassary functions by the use of ajax.
for developing this soft jquery library is applied where needed and in the next version jquery will probably be replaced with ajax.net completely.some of the characteristics of XC(xamfiachat) is simplicity in configuration and the other is applying it.
XC designed based on Membership,Profile and .NET standard web classes,therefor it can matched with your web sites.

: : : : :


C# asp.net webservice ajax .net jquery ...
